title: 820-00239 your computer restarted because of a problem
message: Good morning, I have this mac that had oxidation C9311, I replaced it, in the tests the mac turns on normally, but restarts and says " your computer restarted because of a problem ".

title: 820-00239 your computer restarted because of a problem
message:
Try to start in safe mode.
Also try SMC bypass.

title: 820-00239 your computer restarted because of a problem
message: If it works in safe mode or SMC bypass it means what?

title: 820-00239 your computer restarted because of a problem
message: In safe mode, the Mac behaved normally.

title: 820-00239 your computer restarted because of a problem
message:
In safe mode, not all drivers are loaded.
Start in diagnostic mode and check if any error pops up.

Try installing Windows and start drivers installation.
See when the machine crashes.
